lead_paragraph: After attacking a nurse and stealing her vehicle, the police say, a man and his teenage companion embarked on a crime spree that spanned multiple police precincts.

headline.print_headline: Two Carjackers Leave a Trail of Mayhem, and a Defiant Victim
headline.main: A Carjacking in Brooklyn Leaves a Trail of Mayhem

snippet: After attacking a nurse and stealing her vehicle, the police say, a man and his teenage companion embarked on a crime spree that spanned multiple police precincts.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column relates story of 56-year-old Russian nurse from Bensonhurst, Brooklyn, who was carjacked by young couple as she drove home in December 2015; notes Yelena was let go after complaining, and had no idea that carjacker, who was later caught and identified as Stafford Berrian, had long criminal history and would go on to assault and rob several others in Brooklyn on same night.
